main event: A UFO sighting occurred over Texarkana, Arkansas on 6 August 1958, involving one object that executed a maneuver and passed through radar.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 seconds,The object was reported to be the size of an aircraft,Military personnel were involved in the observation,The object was described as possibly a balloon or an astronomical phenomenon,The lights on the object went out as it passed through the observer's altitude.
witness description: Captain J.S. Morrison, pilot from Shaw AFB, S.C.
